title: errors in server log when synchronising files with client
body:
<h3>expected behaviour

all data gets uploaded to server without any error log.
<h3>actual behaviour

when uploading a file a error is triggered in the logfile. nevertheless some data is uploaded fine. client sync protocol shows all files in error category.
<h3>steps to reproduce

add new data to owncloud sync folder (data existed before and was synced).

<h3>server configuration

operating system:win7 x64
web server: iis7
database:mysql 5
php version:5.4
owncloud version:5.0.7 (still exists after update to 5.0.9)
<h3>client configuration

browser: firefox 22
operating system: win7 x64
<h3>logs

web server error log looks like the following but in different variations:
* error while running hook (\oc\files\cache\updater::writehook): sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 1366 incorrect integer value: '' for column 'mtime' at row 1
* filesize(): stat failed for filepath at ..\owncloud\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95
* filemtime(): stat failed for filepath at ..\owncloud\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#113
* fopen(filepath): failed to open stream: no such file or directory at ..\owncloud\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#173

most cases look like that (for every file):
* filesize(): stat failed for partition:path\owncloud/user/files/filepath.part at partition:path\owncloud\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95
* fopen(partition:path\owncloud/future/files/filepath.part): failed to open stream: no such file or directory at partition:path\owncloud\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#173
